content.content: Hello community, I had a problem some time ago with sending an IAD through the FTM network.    Fantom (FTM) Blockchain Explorer    Fantom Transaction Hash (Txhash) Details | FtmScan Fantom (FTM) detailed transaction info for txhash 0x79b9e7d09d361b93d0a5a19966d987c8a4a1b6ca96a36e90e38489861c75bcfd. The transaction status, block confirmation, gas fee, FTM, and token transfer are shown.      I sent 4900 IADs from the FTM network to an IAD address on Binance on an ERC20 IAD deposit address. I wanted to know who received the funds and are they recoverable from Binance directly or another platform (FTM or DAI). Best regards
Regularly, Binance helps in such cases, you should contact Binance support and see what you can achieve with them. Can you keep us informed if you get any resolution to your problem?

This link can help you, as Diego says Binance it helps in this kind of cases.    binance.com    Centro de Ayuda Binance Exchange de Criptomonedas - Operamos el exchange de criptomonedas con mayor volumen en el mundo

I have sent several messages to Binance and have had no response from the helpdesk. I have recently changed my tactics and have sent a binance angel on telegram, I will keep you posted but I have little hope
This topic was automatically closed 91 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
